  • Constructor Details

    • CarSeatAvailableService

      public CarSeatAvailableService()

  • Method Details

    • sortCarAvailableSeats

      public void sortCarAvailableSeats(Car car)
      Sort a HashMap list by the car available seats and its ID. This improves efficiency because to find a car with seats available, it is not necessary to search in the entire DB, only in sub-lists.
      Parameters:
      car -

    • searchAvailableCar

      public void searchAvailableCar(Journey journey)
      Search a car (with seats available) for a journey, update the journey with the ID of the car assigned, and update the new seats available in the car. Try matching the same people and seats available, if it is not possible, search in the next car with more seats available.
      Parameters:
      journey -

    • updateCarAndHashMap

      public void updateCarAndHashMap(Long carId, int numPeople, boolean addPeople)
      Update the car in DB with the new available seats depending on if people are leaving or getting into. Update the HashMap list with the new available seats by removing the car ID of the old sub-list, and then calling to sortCarAvailableSeats to update the ID in the new sub-list depending on the new available seats.
      Parameters:
      carId -
      numPeople -
      addPeople -

    • clearHashMap

      public void clearHashMap()
      Clear all the HashMap list and sub-lists

    • findCarById

      public Car findCarById(Long id)
      Find the Car object in the DB given its ID
      Parameters:
      id -
